Package javelin.controller.action.ai.attack

Class RangedAttack

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.action.Action
      • javelin.controller.action.ai.attack.AbstractAttack
        • javelin.controller.action.ai.attack.RangedAttack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ActionDescription, AiAction
    public class RangedAttack
extends AbstractAttack
    needs to take into account range increments, each full range increment imposes a cumulative -2 penalty on the attack roll. Actually doesn't sound too important since most weapons used have really long ranges for our combats also -4 if in mel√©e with another enemy (many more details @ http://www.d20pfsrd.com/gamemastering/combat
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    RangedTarget, Serialized Form
